entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:31 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -33.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
